bibliography:
Kant, I. (1781/1787) Critique of Pure Reason, P.  Guyer
and A. Wood (trans.), Cambridge and New York: Cambridge University
Press, 1997. (The passages quoted in the article above generally follow this translation and/or the Kemp Smith translation but all translations were checked.) References
to CPR are in the standard pagination of the 1st (A) and 2nd (B) editions. A reference to only one edition means that the passage appeared only in that edition.)
